characters.name: Ji-Woo Seo
characters.description:
He is a very bright and kind person who will go out of his way to help the people around him. His main ability is super speed. 

In the past, Ji-U had no friends because he was afraid that people would discover his powers and those they discovered would treat him like a freak. The first friend he made was a stray cat, which led to his adoration for cats today.

His mentor is Kayden Break, who started to live with him. He is friends with Ji-Seok Yu, U-In, and Su-Bin Lee.

characters.name: Kayden Break
characters.description: Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a fat old fluffy cat. The strongest unaffiliated person in the world, capable to crush even those trained by the groups, which had accumulated vast amounts of data in their systems over the years. He is teaching Jiwoo about the awakened world as his teacher and coach.

characters.name: Ji-Seok Yu
characters.description:
He is the younger brother of Ji-Yeong Yu, the CEO of Shinhwa Association.

He is one of the most powerful, if not the most powerful, awakened person in his age group in South Korea.  There are only a few teenage awakeners in Korea that are able to rival him. Like his sister, his awakened power is aerokinesis. 

He is friends with U-In, Ji-U Seo and eventually Su-Bin Lee.

characters.name: Ji-Yeong Yu
characters.description:
Being the leader of Shinhwa, Ji-Yeong Yu's responsibility is to teach new awakened ability users the basics and provide the most basic levels of support as well as keep the awakened world hidden from the normal world.

She is a famous highly ranked awakened wind ability user, the most powerful awakened in South Korea and has a good reputation. She's the older sister of Ji-Seok Yu.

characters.name: U-In
characters.description: U-In was a student under Dr. Delein, and has no known last name that is currently revealed. He is an independent awakener with no affiliation. His ability is telekinesis. U-In becomes friends with Ji-U, Ji-Seok and Su-Bin.

characters.name: Su-Bin Lee
characters.description: She is the granddaughter of the Awakened Union leader. She is on par with Ji-Seok in terms of power, making her quite strong. She is friends with Ji-Seok, Ji-U, and U-In. Her ability is cryokinesis.

characters.name: In-Hyeok Gu
characters.description: He is known to be in the top 20 in the ranks of awakened people in Korea, however, his rank is unknown. He is often seen with Ji-Yeong as they assist matters of Shinhwa together.

characters.name: Seong-Ha Park
characters.description: Seong-Ha Park’s past has not yet been revealed, however he is a strong awakener as he is considered to be in the top 20 ranks of powerful awakeners in Korea. He is part of the Awakened Union and has close ties to the leadership of the group as shown by how highly Su-Bin Lee regards him.

characters.name: I-Seul Ju
characters.description:
She is the student representative of Mir, an organization made up of awakeners that specialize in controlling animals. Her ability is also animal control. 

I-Seul has a white pet dog that is very big and loves hugs. His name is Duri.

characters.name: Bo-Yeong Choi
characters.description: She is a friend of Jae-Hyeok Lee and one of the awakeners that the Shinhwa Association sent to the Awakened Academy. She does show a very cheerful persona, although it seems like she is cunning and sly. Not much is known about her abilities and fighting prowess, but it can be assumed that she is roughly at the same level as Jae-Hyeok as she was chosen by the Shinhwa Association to participate in the Awakened Academy. It can also be assumed that her ability is Aerokinesis like the rest of the members of Shinhwa.
